title: I died!!!!!!!
body:
So I was checking out MasterMirkinen's profile, when I stumbled upon this gold.
Check out their team name :D.

replies.body:
>I died!!!!!!!

So did your sense of humour apparently.
I appreciate all things to do with sex :D.

Wait a second, how is it they are allowed to have stuff about BJ's but i can't post porn on the boards?

Rito please.
thats going to be one raw coq
